body:
> However, an alternative solution seems to be to just use `gmtime_s()`
> instead, when compiling with `mingw-w64`, as `gmtime_r()` [just wraps `gmtime_s()` anyways](https://github.com/mirror/mingw-w64/blob/7c03b11bf173944679102bbe0ac061842e2f594b/mingw-w64-headers/crt/time.h#L284).

Does this alternative solution has any downsides?
